forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, then clouds lingering for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
